author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Constance Hotels Services Posts Group Revenue of 3.77 Bln Rupees
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Constance Hotels Services Ltd :
* CONSTANCE HOTELS SERVICES LTD - FOR FY ENDED DEC 31, GROUP REVENUE 3.77 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 3.63 BILLION RUPEES
* CONSTANCE HOTELS SERVICES LTD - FOR FY ENDED DEC 31, GROUP PROFIT BEFORE TAXATION 133.2 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 69.5 MILLION RUPEES
* CONSTANCE HOTELS SERVICES LTD - FOR THE FIRST QUARTER 2018, OPERATIONS IN ALL MAIN DESTINATIONS, INCLUDING THE MALDIVES, STARTED WELL
* CONSTANCE HOTELS SERVICES - CURRENT POLITICAL INSTABILITY IN MALDIVES REMAINS A THREAT AND COULD IMPACT BOOKINGS FOR REST OF THE YEAR, IF PROLONGED
* CONSTANCE HOTELS SERVICES - FIRST QUARTER PERFORMANCE IS ENCOURAGING AND THE FORWARD TREND IN BOOKINGS FOR MAURITIUS AND SEYCHELLES LOOKS HEALTHY Source text ( bit.ly/2IcselF ) Further company coverage:
